entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS EARLY THIS EVENING, THEN SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
